attributes.additional_details: over 2 million peopke have signed the petition to re vote ans remain in the EU. we need to stop this re vote taking place.For all the people that voted leave...please sign this petition
attributes.background: British people voted to leave the EU. Whilst we won this vote there is a petition for a re vote. we need to gain more signitures in order to petition the re vote.Please sign to leave the EU counter petition the re vote
